credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for ceiling decoration
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink at upper edge (*check this*)
description: Horizontal rectangle. A variation of the scheme of -1522. The supports are fluted. Between the right ones stands an urn, below a festoon. A landscape with a volcano is shown in the semi-circle. View at an ovoidal colonnade, with a double row of Doric columns.
name: Drawing
